languages.text: "Я помогу тебе. Только сохрани мне жизнь".

traits.locale_text: "Я помогу тебе. Только сохрани мне жизнь".

languages.text: "I will help you. As long as you spare my life."
languages.original_text: "Я помогу тебе. Только сохрани мне жизнь".

traits.locale_text: "Fine, so be it. I will help you. As long as you spare my life."
"Fine, so be it. I will help you. As long as you spare my life."
"I will help you. As long as you spare my life."
"I will help you. As long as you spare my life."
"I will help you. As long as you spare my life."
"I will help you. As long as you spare my life."

languages.text: “我愿意帮助你，只希望你能饶我一命。”
languages.original_text: "I will help you. As long as you spare my life."

traits.locale_text: “我愿意帮助你，只希望你能饶我一命。”

languages.text: «Le ayudaré, siempre que prometa que yo estaré a salvo».
languages.original_text: "I will help you. As long as you spare my life."

traits.locale_text: «Le ayudaré, siempre que prometa que yo estaré a salvo».

languages.text: 「お前を助けてやろう。お前が私を見逃してくれるのなら」
languages.original_text: "I will help you. As long as you spare my life."

traits.locale_text: 「お前を助けてやろう。お前が私の命を救ってくれるなら」
「お前を助けてやろう。お前が私を見逃してくれるのなら」

languages.text: « Je vous aiderai si vous me laissez la vie sauve. »
languages.original_text: "I will help you. As long as you spare my life."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous aiderai si vous me laissez la vie sauve. »

languages.text: "Ich werde Euch helfen. Solange Ihr mich am Leben lasst."
languages.original_text: "I will help you. As long as you spare my life."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde Euch helfen. Solange Ihr mich am Leben lasst."

languages.text: "Kabul, yardım edeceğim. Yeter ki canımı bağışla."
languages.original_text: "I will help you. As long as you spare my life."

traits.locale_text: "Kabul, yardım edeceğim. Yeter ki canımı bağışla."
